verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <WH1984> Hal-lu Praise יָ֨הּ׀ <WH3050> yah ye the LORD הַֽלְל֣וּ <WH1984> hal-Lu Praise אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh ye the LORD מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַשָּׁמַ֑יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim; from the heavens הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <WH1984> hal-Lu-hu, praise בַּמְּרוֹמִֽים׃ <WH4791> bam-me-ro-Mim. him in the heights

הַֽלְל֥וּהוּ <WH1984> hal-Lu-hu Praise כָל־ <WH3605> chol all מַלְאָכָ֑יו <WH4397> mal-'a-Chav; ye him all his angels הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <WH1984> hal-Lu-hu, praise כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all; צְבָאֹו tze-va-'ov כצְבָאָֽיו׃ <WH6635> tze-va-'Av. appointed time ק

הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ <WH1984> Hal-lu-hu Praise שֶׁ֣מֶשׁ <WH8121> She-mesh ye him sun וְיָרֵ֑חַ <WH3394> ve-ya-Re-ach; and moon הַ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <WH1984> hal-Lu-hu, praise כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all כּ֥וֹכְבֵי <WH3556> Koch-vei him all ye stars אֽוֹר׃ <WH216> or. of light

הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ <WH1984> Hal-lu-hu Praise שְׁמֵ֣י <WH8064> she-Mei him ye heavens הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim; of heavens וְ֝הַמַּ֗יִם <WH4325> ve-ham-Ma-yim, and ye waters אֲשֶׁ֤ר׀ <WH834> 'a-Sher after מֵעַ֬ל <WH5921> me-'Al and הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim. that [be] above the heavens

יְֽ֭הַֽלְלוּ <WH1984> Ye-hal-lu Let them praise אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> shem the name יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for ה֭וּא <WH1931> hu He צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah for he commanded וְנִבְרָֽאוּ׃ <WH1254> ve-niv-Ra-'u. and they were created

וַיַּעֲמִידֵ֣ם <WH5975> vai-ya-'a-mi-Dem He hath also stablished לָעַ֣ד <WH5703> la-'Ad them for ever לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam; and ever חָק־ <WH2706> chok- a decree נָ֝תַ֗ן <WH5414> na-Tan, he hath made וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo which will not יַעֲבֽוֹר׃ <WH5674> ya-'a-Vor. which shall not pass

הַֽלְל֣וּ <WH1984> hal-Lu Praise אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; from the earth תַּ֝נִּינִ֗ים <WH8577> tan-ni-Nim, ye dragons וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all תְּהֹמֽוֹת׃ <WH8415> te-ho-Mot. and all deeps

אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> 'esh Fire וּ֭בָרָד <WH1259> U-va-rod and hail שֶׁ֣לֶג <WH7950> She-leg snow וְקִיט֑וֹר <WH7008> ve-ki-Tor; and vapour ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach wind סְ֝עָרָ֗ה <WH5591> se-'a-Rah, stormy עֹשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> 'o-Sah fulfilling דְבָרֽוֹ׃ <WH1697> de-va-Ro. his word

הֶהָרִ֥ים <WH2022> he-ha-Rim Mountains וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all גְּבָע֑וֹת <WH1389> ge-va-'ot; and all hills עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> 'etz trees פְּ֝רִ֗י <WH6529> pe-Ri, fruitful וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all אֲרָזִֽים׃ <WH730> 'a-ra-Zim. and all cedars

הַֽחַיָּ֥ה <WH2416> ha-chai-Yah Beasts וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all בְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> be-he-Mah; and all cattle רֶ֝֗מֶשׂ <WH7431> Re-mes, creeping things וְצִפּ֥וֹר <WH6833> ve-tzip-Por fowl כָּנָֽף׃ <WH3671> ka-Naf. and flying

מַלְכֵי־ <WH4428> mal-chei- Kings אֶ֭רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz of the earth וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all לְאֻמִּ֑ים <WH3816> le-'um-Mim; and all people שָׂ֝רִ֗ים <WH8269> Rim, princes וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all שֹׁ֥פְטֵי <WH8199> Sho-fe-tei and all judges אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> 'A-retz. of the earth

בַּחוּרִ֥ים <WH970> ba-chu-Rim Both young men וְגַם־ <WH1571> ve-gam- again בְּתוּל֑וֹת <WH1330> be-tu-Lot; and maidens זְ֝קֵנִ֗ים <WH2205> ze-ke-Nim, old men עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with נְעָרִֽים׃ <WH5288> ne-'a-Rim. and children

יְהַלְל֤וּ׀ <WH1984> ye-hal-Lu Let them praise אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שֵׁ֬ם <WH8034> shem the name יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for נִשְׂגָּ֣ב <WH7682> nis-Gav alone is excellent שְׁמ֣וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo for his name לְבַדּ֑וֹ <WH905> le-vad-Do; alone ה֝וֹד֗וֹ <WH1935> ho-Do, his glory עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is above אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz [is] above the earth וְשָׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> ve-sha-Ma-yim. and heaven

וַיָּ֤רֶם <WH7311> vai-Ya-rem He also exalteth קֶ֨רֶן׀ <WH7161> Ke-ren the horn לְעַמּ֡וֹ <WH5971> le-'am-Mo of his people תְּהִלָּ֤ה <WH8416> te-hil-Lah the praise לְֽכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol for all חֲסִידָ֗יו <WH2623> cha-si-Dav, of all his saints לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei [even] of the children יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'el of Israel עַֽם־ <WH5971> 'am- a people קְרֹב֗וֹ <WH7138> ke-ro-Vo, near הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> hal-lu- unto him Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> Yah. ye the LORD
